level.heading: Underwriting contract required with title insurer.
level.text: A person acting in the capacity of a title insurance producer shall not place business with a title insurer unless there is in force a written contract between the parties which sets forth the responsibilities of each party, and, if both parties share responsibility for a particular function, specifies the division of the responsibilities.
